name: PT (Terminal 69)
description:
Link wakes up in the middle of the night to find their fairy is missing, and all the windows and doors in their home have vanished.

This is a generative piece, so you may not see everything the first time you play.

Mouse/Trackpad to play. Q to chicken out, P to crank it up.

Thank you to playtesters:

Darwin, Danny, Schera, Aleksei, Michael, Michelle, Matt, Frank, Jamie, Kai

Estimated playtime: 3 - 10 minutes.

If you enjoyed this experience, please look forward to our next title:

Terminal 69!

Coming soon!
